text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! geudaedeul-i naui gil-eseo naui gippeum-eul ganguhamyeo chuljeonhayeossdamyeon naui jeoggwa geudaedeul-ui jeog-eul gyoulo duji malla. geudaedeul-ege dolaehan jinlileul geudeul-i imi bulsinhayeoss-eum-edo geudaedeul-eun geudeul-ege salang-eul deuliunola. geudaedeul-i geudaedeul-ui junim-isin hananim-eul midneundaneun iyulo geudeul-eun sadowa geudaedeul-eul chubanghayeossnola. geudaedeul-eun salang-eul iyulo geudeul-ege bimil-eul balseolhajiman sillo naneun geudaedeul-i sumgineun geosgwa naeboineun geos-eul algo issnola. geudaedeul jung-e geuleohge haneun ja issdamyeon sillo geuneun olbaleun gil-eul beos-eona banghwanghan geos-ila
